price: 18 C’est ainsi qu’il vit certains des grands signes de son Seigneur.
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
